LanguageData.PsychiteRefining.label: Cocaine Refining
LanguageData.PsychiteRefining.description: Learn to refine coca leaves into powdered and crack cocaine, different forms of the euphoric drug cocaine.
LanguageData.PsychoidBrewing.label: Coca Brewing
LanguageData.PsychoidBrewing.description: Prepare coca leaves into a mildly euphoria-inducing and addictive tea at the campfire or cooking stove.
LanguageData.WakeUpProduction.label: Amphetamine Production
LanguageData.WakeUpProduction.description: Your chemists learn the formulas and techniques for synthesizing amphetamines, a work performance-enhancing drug.
